    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spiral path of a beam of accelerated protons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiralepfad eines Lichtstrahls der 
beschleunigten Protone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voie d'accès en spirale d'un faisceau des 
protons accélérés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trajeto espiral de um feixe de protons 
acelerados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percorso a spirale di un fascio dei protoni 
accelerati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπειροειδές μονοπάτι μιας ακτίνας των επιταχυνόμενων 
πρωτονίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Camino espiral de una viga de protones 
acelerados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that a beam of protons undergo a spiral path as it accelerates inside a cyclotron.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cyclotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proton beams</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß ein 
Lichtstrahl der Protone einen Spiralepfad durchmachen, während er 
innerhalb eines Cyclotron beschleunigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'un faisceau des protons 
subissent une voie d'accès en spirale pendant qu'il accélère à 
l'intérieur d'un cyclotron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que um feixe dos protons se
submete a um trajeto espiral enquanto acelera dentro de um cyclotron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che un fascio dei protoni 
subisce un percorso a spirale mentre accelerare all'interno di un 
ciclotrone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι μια ακτίνα των 
πρωτονίων υποβάλλεται σε ένα σπειροειδές μονοπάτι όπως 
επιταχύνει μέσα σε ένα κυκλοτρόνιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que una viga de protones 
experimenta un camino espiral mientras que acelera dentro de un 
ciclotrón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cyclotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Protonlichtstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
